title: BaseUI Design System
content: Official Base Web (BaseUI) documentation for UI components used throughout the homepage implementation. BaseUI provides pre-built, accessible components with built-in theming support.

title: Styletron Atomic CSS-in-JS
content: Styletron documentation explaining the atomic CSS-in-JS approach used for styling. The useStyletron hook provides access to the css function and theme object for dynamic styling.

title: Jotai State Management
content: Jotai documentation for atomic state management. The showHomepageAtom follows Jotai patterns for creating primitive atoms that can be read and written from any component.

title: Dexie.js IndexedDB Wrapper
content: Dexie.js documentation for working with IndexedDB in a simpler way. The versioning system is used to safely add the recentActivity table without breaking existing databases.

title: dexie-react-hooks useLiveQuery
content: Documentation for useLiveQuery hook that provides reactive database queries. The hook automatically re-renders the component when the underlying data changes.

title: React i18next Internationalization
content: React i18next documentation for implementing internationalization. The useTranslation hook provides the t() function for translating text keys to localized strings.

title: React Suspense for Lazy Loading
content: React documentation on Suspense for handling asynchronous components and data loading. Used to wrap RecentActivityList to prevent blocking the initial render.

title: React Icons Library
content: React Icons provides SVG icons as React components. The remix icon set (ri) is used for translate, polish, summarize, settings, and vocabulary icons throughout the homepage.

title: Tauri Multi-Window Architecture
content: Tauri documentation on creating and managing multiple windows. The windowsMap pattern allows different window labels to render different components.

title: Internal State Management Knowledge
content: Project-specific knowledge about state management strategy using Jotai for atomic state, Zustand for global state, and React hooks for local state.

title: Internal Styling Patterns Knowledge
content: Project-specific knowledge about styling with BaseUI + Styletron, including IThemedStyleProps interface and theme usage patterns.

title: Internal i18n Implementation Knowledge
content: Project-specific knowledge about internationalization using i18next with 55+ supported languages and translation key organization.

title: Internal Common Layer Architecture Knowledge
content: Project-specific knowledge about the common layer organization with platform-agnostic components, services, and state management.

title: WCAG 2.1 Accessibility Guidelines
content: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards for keyboard navigation, focus indicators, and screen reader support implemented in the homepage components.

title: CSS Grid Layout Specification
content: MDN documentation on CSS Grid Layout used for responsive quick action card arrangement. The auto-fit and minmax functions create a flexible, responsive grid.
